overview: Giles Goodwin is the Co-founder, CTO and VP of Engineering at Widgetbox. Giles has over 14 years experience in building innovative software products and managing computer technologies. Prior to co-founding Widgetbox, Giles was Chief Portal Suite Architect and Director of Engineering at Vignette, a global content management company, where he was responsible for the management and development of composite application and web services technology. Prior to his role at Vignette, Giles was the Director of Engineering at Epicentric which was acquired byVignette. Prior to joining Epicentric, Giles was the Lead Developer and Architect at Application Park, an online web application builder and portal company which was acquired by Epicentric. Giles holds a BS in Physics from the University of California at Riverside, where he is currently a member of the Deanâ€™s Board of Advisors for the universityâ€™s College of Natural and Agricultural Science.
